Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' Video: Howard Stern signs autographs before David Letterman appearance Howard Stern first joked about David Letterman 's 2009 tabloid troubles by referencing his own experiences working at CBS. `` You had your scandal. Charlie Sheen has his scandal. They keep hiring you guys. Me, I got fired. They took me to court and sued me. What did I do wrong? I mentioned where I work... You guys are up to shenanigans I'm back stage looking over everyone going:` Did you have sex with David Letterman ?'. Howard Stern was sued by CBS in 2006 when the company accused him of using his terrestrial radio air time to promote his new satellite radio gig at Sirius.
